title: Theory-Based Instructional Design Research Methodology Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding foundational educational technology theories and research methodologies
context.additional_context: Advanced course for language education learners, focusing on theory development and validation through iterative design-execution-analysis cycles

learning_goals: Learners can systematically explain procedures for analyzing interactions between educational theories and practical design.
Learners can develop language education prototypes applying a three-stage iterative research cycle (design-implementation-evaluation).
Learners can systematically record/analyze system interaction data generated during research and derive theoretical implications.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
